text: The 1914 Geneva Covenanters football team represented the Geneva College during the 1914 college football season. The head coach was C. B. Metheny coaching the team in his second year. The team finished the season with a final record of 5–3. ==Schedule== ==References== Geneva Category:Geneva Golden Tornadoes football seasons Geneva Covenanters football
title: 1914 Geneva Covenanters football team
